nodes.text: The Loro Babis system was a binary star system located within the Sith Worlds region of the Esstran sector in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy, which contained three uninhabited planets.

Jedi Knight Chamma traveled to the system with two other Jedi to investigate a Republic aligned emergency beacon. The small taskforce landed on the second planet, Athiss, to investigate. Encountering a dark side beast there, he believed he brushed the dark side and had failed a test of the Force.
